message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special starting price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $18,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still looking to keep my spending within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $16,000? This would allow me to make a purchase without exceeding my financial limits.
